title: I Wrote Movie Spoilers On Bald Men's Heads...
description: In this video, Max Fosh writes movie spoilers on the heads of bald men as a prank.
summary: Max Fosh goes around writing movie spoilers on the heads of unsuspecting bald men, capturing their reactions.
payoff: The payoff comes from the reactions of the bald men as they discover the spoilers on their heads, ranging from confusion to amusement.
